text:
HANDWRITTEN INVOICE (SCANNED)

From: Joe's Plumbing
       123 Pipe St

To: Mrs. Johnson
    456 Oak Lane

Date of Service: 11/15/24

Work Performed:
- Fixed leaky faucet in kitchen
- Replaced washer and valve
- Checked water pressure

Parts: $45
Labor (1.5 hrs): $120
-----------------
TOTAL: $165

Please pay within 2 weeks

Thank you!

[signature]
Joe Martinez
Lic# PLB-44521
